LEVEL/SHOW_HITBOXES_ON_DEATH/HACK_SHOW_H: Visualizes level hitboxes, only on death
LEVEL/HACK_SHOW_LAYOUT/TIP: Removes all decoration and color from levels
UNIVERSAL/CUSTOM_BG/HACK_CUSTOM_BG/TIP: Customize the color of GD menus
UNIVERSAL/TRANSITION_CUSTOMISER/HACK_TRA: Customize the type and duration of scene transitions
